nodes.body: mdo ‘don thabs. On specific sūtras. Ex: ‘Jam dpal mtshan brjod ‘don thabs (W16592), Phung po gsum pa’i mdo’i ‘don thabs (W11437), Gser ‘od ‘don thabs (W1302), Mdo sde brgyad brgya pa’i ‘don thabs (W16761), Sdud pa sogs sher mdo’i ‘don thabs (W11436), Thar pa chen po'i klog pa dang kha ton bya tshul (W17468).
nodes.title: About Sūtra recitation instructions
